infovue.header: Hello! We’re happy to see someone interested in learning more about this app. The following points describe our approach to user privacy and provide some contact information. If you need anything or just want to reach out, don’t hesitate to contact us, our team will be glad to respond.
infovue.privacytext2: as one of our top priorities — we use only essential technical cookies and follow a near-zero log policy, as outlined in our
infovue.abusetext1: We moderate content to ensure a pleasant experience for our users. If you encounter any policy violations or notice inappropriate or dangerous behavior, please contact us at
infovue.abusetext2: . If you’re reporting another user’s inappropriate behavior, don’t forget to include a screenshot or picture.
infovue.abusetext3: Further information about child safety policy can be found
infovue.techtext1: For any technical problem you can contact us at
infovue.message: Lastly, we hope you’re enjoying your stay and wish you a great day.
infovue.adstext1: We offer ad slots directly on this site. These placements are fully self-served, with no involvement of third-party ad networks, cookies, or tracking scripts. If you’re interested in promoting your project or product here, please reach out at
infovue.push_not: Please not that since we do not require permissions to notifications, you won't be notified of incoming comments or messages when the application is closed.

subscription.subscription_successfull_message: Thank you for subscribing. The subscription will renew automatically every month.
Your subscription will end at the end of this billing period.
